summary: Bloodthorn Manor is a purchasable player home located near Dragon bridge, that is suited for both human and vampire characters.
descriptionHtml:
[b][color=#00ff00][size=4]IF YOU ENJOYED PLAYING WITH THIS MOD, PLEASE REMEMBER TO LEAVE AN ENDORSEMENT :)[/size][/color]



[color=#ffff00]
[size=3]REQUIREMENTS:[/size]
[/color][/b][color=#ffff00]
- Skyrim
- Dawnguard DLC

[/color]
[color=#00ff00][b][size=3]DESCRIPTION:[/size]
[/b]
This is a purchasable player home, the ownership of which you can acquire for [b]38000 gold[/b] by clicking on the [b]"For Sale"[/b] sign, that is located on the lamp post near the bridge that leads to the house. The house is located south west of Dragon bridge. There are two versions of this mod; one for human and one for vampire characters. The mod also features a new spellsword follower, many custom meshes and textures, and a lot of safe storage. The interior of the house is made up of two spaces: the main house, and the lower levels, the entrance to which are hidden behind a false wardrobe in the wine cellar.

[b]Its features include:

Main house:[/b]

- Parlor,
- Dining room,
- Kitchen,
- Wine cellar (mead storage),
- Library (bookshelves, scroll storage),
- Main bedroom (weapon racks, chest, safe, scroll storage, bookshelves),
- Follower bedroom (weapon rack),
- Cook's bedroom,
- Thrall's/servant's bedroom,
- Storage (wine and mead storage)

[b]Lower levels:[/b]

- Main cavern (alchemy lab, enchanting desk, book shelves, mannequin, scroll storage, chest),
- Study (bookshelves)
- Sarcophagus chamber/smithing area in human version (weapon and shielf plaques in human version)
- Flooded cavern[/color]

[b]
[color=#ffff00][size=3]UPDATES:[/size]

Version 1.2:
- Fixed CharGen bug
- Fixed nasty misspelling in Bill of Sale
- Fixed Sarcophagus sleeping animation for the vampire version[/color][/b]

[b]
[color=#00ff00][size=3]FUTURE UPDATES:[/size]
[/color][/b][color=#00ff00]
- A fixed waterfall exit
- Updates suggested by users[/color]

[b]
[color=#ffff00][size=3]SPECIAL THANKS TO:[/size][/color][/b][color=#ffff00]
[b]
Oaristys[/b] and [b]Tony67[/b] for Modders Resource Pack
[b]
yourenotsupposedtobeinhere[/b] for Rug Resource 
[b]
Blary [/b]for OpenBooks Resource 
[b]
Eldiabs[/b] for Modders Resource-Weapon Racks-Bookshelves-Plaques-Mannequins 
[b]
Artisanix[/b] for Paintings and Frames 
[b]
berticus0001 [/b]for[b] [/b]Berts Bits And Bobs Resources For Modders[/color]
author: Rajti15
